channel.title: [Hyperion] Item ID Compatibility with Item Slots

item.title: [Hyperion] Item ID Compatibility with Item Slots
item.dc:creator: @joelandjacob joelandjacob
item.description:
@joelandjacob wrote:

Hey, I was wondering… if Item Id’s are compatible with Item Slots… Such as:

	public static String body[] = {
		"body", "hauberk", "top", "torso", "ghostly robe", "3rd age robe top",  "rock-shell plate", "brassard", "platemail", "bomber jacket", "armadyl chestplate", "bandos chestplate"
	};

Would Item ID’s be compatible?

Read full topic
item.source: [Hyperion] Item ID Compatibility with Item Slots
